languages.text: Могущественная варп-сущность обещала Вольному Торговцу могущество и власть, если {mf|тот|та} сумеет стать новым чемпионом Хаоса.
The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.
languages.original_text: Могущественная варп-сущность обещала Вольному Торговцу могущество и власть, если {mf|тот|та} сумеет стать новым чемпионом Хаоса.

traits.locale_text: The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.
The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.
The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.
The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.

languages.text: Die mächtige Wesenheit des Warps versprach {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} große Macht, sofern es {mf|ihm|ihr} gelingt, der neue Champion des Chaos zu werden.
languages.original_text: The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: Die mächtige Wesenheit des Warps versprach {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} große Macht, sofern es {mf|ihm|ihr} gelingt, der neue Champion des Chaos zu werden.

languages.text: La redoutable entité du Warp a promis gloire et puissance {mf|au libre-marchand s'il|à la libre-marchande si elle} parvenait à devenir {mf|le nouveau champion|la nouvelle championne} du Chaos.
languages.original_text: The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: La redoutable entité du Warp a promis gloire et puissance {mf|au libre-marchand s'il|à la libre-marchande si elle} parvenait à devenir {mf|le nouveau champion|la nouvelle championne} du Chaos.

languages.text: El poderoso ser de la disformidad ha prometido a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente poder incalculable si se convierte en {mf|el|la} nuev{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona} del Caos.
languages.original_text: The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: El poderoso ser de la disformidad ha prometido a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente poder incalculable si se convierte en {mf|el|la} nuev{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona} del Caos.

languages.text: 这位强大的亚空间生物承诺，只要行商浪人能成为混沌的神选者，就可以得到无比强大的力量。
languages.original_text: The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: 这位强大的亚空间生物承诺，只要行商浪人能成为混沌的神选者，就可以得到无比强大的力量。

languages.text: 強力な歪みの実体は、自分が新たな渾沌の王者になった暁には、自由開拓者に凄まじい力を与えると約束した。
languages.original_text: The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: 強力な歪みの実体は、自分が新たな渾沌の王者になった暁には、自由開拓者に凄まじい力を与えると約束した。

languages.text: Güçlü öteboyut varlığı, yeni Kaos müdafisi olmayı başarırsa Hür Tacir'e kudret ve güç bahşetmeyi vadetti.
languages.original_text: The powerful warp entity promised the Rogue Trader might and power if {mf|he|she} managed to become the new champion of Chaos.
